subject: Attn: Account Holder,
body:
Attn: Account Holder,
is to notify you that a new development has been made in which the UK
Bank which is called Mercantile Bank online (MBO) which has been
holding your funds all this while has been ordered to release it to
you. The bank has created an online bank account on your behalf and
the online bank account has been funded with the total sum of in which
you would be able to withdraw any amount of money daily from the
online account,
Below are the online bank account details Welcome! To Mercantile Bank
Online Plc Secure Account Page
2024-02-2. Created Open Account
Balance $8,500,000,00 USD
Sort Code. 00169381101-43372 1020-03-8733
Swift Code PNBPUS33
Account Number 36534846755
The bank has also stated that you could be able to start accessing the
online bank account once the transfer code has been issued to you and
this code will be issued to you at the sum of $50Usd.The bank has also
directed that the payment should be sent through Bitcoin or Gift Card.
By Apple card. Ok
Payment Option:
Bitcoin:
Or
Gift Card
Apple card ($50)
Send the payment details to me as soon as you make the payment
Once the payment of $50Usd has been received by today, then the bank
would issue the TRANSFER CODE/TRANSFER PIN to you which you would use
to make the final transfer to any bank account of your choice. I would
be waiting for the details as directed as soon as possible,
THANKS FOR YOUR COOPERATION.
Respectively
Mercantile Bank online
Mr.Anthony Robert
Assistant Director.

subject: Re: Attn: Account Holder,
body:
Hello Robert,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate you notifying me about the new development regarding my funds at Mercantile Bank online MBO. It's good to know that the bank has created an online bank account on my behalf and funded it with a balance of USD.

I'm interested in accessing the online bank account and withdrawing money from it. Could you please provide me with more details about how I can obtain the transfer code? You mentioned that there is a payment required for it, but I would like to understand why and how this payment is necessary.

Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by sending the payment through Bitcoin or Gift Card? How does that process work exactly?

Thank you for your assistance, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Lee
